definition: The term "gebacken" refers to a culinary technique involving the preparation of food by subjecting it to dry heat in an enclosed space, such as an oven or a stove. It is commonly used to describe the state of food after it has undergone this cooking process, resulting in a desirable texture and flavor.

examples.german: Ich habe gestern einen Kuchen gebacken.
Meine Oma hat immer selbstgebackenes Brot gemacht.
examples.english: My grandma always made homemade bread.

examples.german: Er hat einen leckeren Apfelkuchen gebacken.
examples.english: He baked a delicious apple pie.

examples.german: Wir haben Plätzchen für Weihnachten gebacken.
